title: Our team is currently seeking an AD/SUPPORT Duo, and a TOP laner who are GOLD+
body:
Lately we have had trouble finding active players, finding many who continuously fail to attend scrims and practice etc. I will organize times for training when we do manage to have a full team ready to go.

We don't care about your skill level. What we care about is how much effort and time you're willing to put in to improve at the game, and wanting to move forward as a team.

Skype or voicechat is a must.

If you are interested. Please post here or add me ingame.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: "We don't care about your skill level" then don't say Gold+ in the title......
Since when did rank depict your skill
Yea, because a bronze and challenger player both have the same skill level.........
this is a silly thing to argue about m8 are you really going to go there
I don't know if you're still checking this post but I am a gold top main who's looking for a serious team to join i added you in game if you didnt get it add me Sensei J
Sent you a friend request in game, just have a few questions thanks

I am  a Support/jg/top Main that is Gold + 
Just reply if u can
Might wanna add what time you practices are if you have problems with people not showing up.
That's something we sort out when we have players. The issue was that when we had everyone we organised times for training etc, then they'd just not show up.
It's better to organise and setup training times when you have the whole team together so we can see when people can and can't play.
I guess but a generalised time to save people contacting you to find its just not good
